snippet: LEAD: California voters, rebelling against the corrupting influence of special-interest money in politics, have approved sweeping ethics and campaign finance reforms. The results ought to inspire members of Congress still stalling similar Federal ...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: California voters, rebelling against the corrupting influence of special-interest money in politics, have approved sweeping ethics and campaign finance reforms. The results ought to inspire members of Congress still stalling similar Federal measures.

headline.main: Topics of the Times;   California's Message on Ethics
